alert.note: Alert for Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 18 at 3:18PM MST until August 18 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Pima County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 400 PM MST. * At 316 PM MST, a line of severe thunderstorms was located 20 miles southeast of Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument, or 42 miles south of Ajo, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Gu Vo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument, Ali Chugk, Pia Oik, Santa Cruz and Lukeville. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
